893830.name: Super Skull Smash GO! 2 Turbo - Soundtrack
893830.description:
"The Super Skull Smash GO! 2 Turbo" soundtrack will be downloaded to your computer as .wav and .flac files. You must have "Super Skull Smash GO! 2 Turbo" installed on your computer as well to receive the DLC content.

Track list:
  • Skull King Around -- 1:28
  • Our Village Is Haunted -- 2:08
  • Steppe To It -- 3:06
  • Mountain Grooves -- 2:32
  • XO Skeleton -- 1:26
  • Poison Alone -- 3:10
  • Crystal Counterpoint -- 1:29
  • The Earth Is Afeared -- 2:13
  • Our Village Is Awesome -- 1:13
  • Addendum -- 0:52
